attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The title veterinary nurse at present is not a protected title. A lot of people who work in practice call them selves veterinary nurses, when they have no theoretical training in such a position. As qualified nurses we feel that this issue should be addressed so that the general public are no longer confused as to the qualification and hopefully make them more aware of the hard work it is to gain the qualification. As we are heading for autonomy within the profession I think it is right and fitting that the title should be protected

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to protect the title 'Veterinary Nurse'.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=vetnurse



Her Majesty's Government
